name: Turtles all the Way Down (after Edward Kemeys after Constantin Brâncuși)
description: Artwork for the #hicathon event. An Edward Kemeys lion that guards the entrance to the Art Institute of Chicago reimagined as a modular structure channeling Constantin Brâncuși. This 3D object was originally produced in 2013 and physical versions of it have been exhibited widely in the USA and beyond. THis is the first time it has been shown in this fashion. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turtles_all_the_way_down
